notes.text:
This update for gc fixes the following issues:

- integer overflow in GC_MALLOC_ATOMIC() (CVE-2016-9427, bsc#1011276)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: Integer overflow vulnerability in bdwgc before 2016-09-27 allows attackers to cause client of bdwgc denial of service (heap buffer overflow crash) and possibly execute arbitrary code via huge allocation.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
